## TrailingNodeExtension.plugin() method

Register the plugin which is responsible for inserting the configured node into the end of the node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
plugin({ tags, schema }: ExtensionManagerParams): Plugin<boolean, any>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { tags, schema } | <code>ExtensionManagerParams</code> |  |
